noun.description: A child, especially a small boy.
examples: I was force-fed vegetables as a nipper

noun.description: Pliers, pincers, forceps, or a similar tool for gripping or cutting.
examples: using a pair of nippers you can chip away at the tiles

noun.description: An insect or other creature that nips or bites.
examples: mosquitoes must be some of the most voracious nippers ever created
